plugin.name: Wallet Store
plugin.description: Enables searching for Intra Users and conecting one to the other

plugin.name: Crypto Addresses
plugin.description: Enables the underground exchange of crypto addresses

plugin.name: Intra Actor
plugin.description: Enables searching for Intra Users and conecting one to the other

addon.name: File System
addon.description: Is the interface between the OS specific File System and the platform components that need to consume file system services

addon.name: Database System
addon.description: Is a wrapper designed to isolate the rest of the components from the OS dependent Database System

addon.name: Database System

step.title: Asset Issuer - Reference Wallet
step.description: Represents UI Android for job with wallet
step.name: Asset Issuer

step.title: Asset Factory
step.description: Represents UI Android for creation the Asset
step.name: Asset Factory

step.title: Asset Issuer - Wallet Module
step.superlayer: Connection layer and the representation of the business layer
step.name: Asset Issuer

step.title: Asset Factory
step.superlayer: Connection layer and the representation of the business layer
step.name: Asset Factory

step.title: Asset Issuer - Actor
step.superlayer: Connection layer and the representation of the business layer

process.name: Install a Crypto Broker Reference Wallet
process.description: Install a Crypto Broker Wallet from the Wallet Store

step.title: Broker select the Reference Wallet from the Wallet Store
step.description: The Crypto Broker enter in the Wallet Store en select the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet to install it.
step.name: Wallet Store

step.title: Invoke the installation of the Reference Wallet to the Wallet Manager
step.description: Invoke the installation of the Reference Wallet to the Wallet Manager Middleware Plugin
step.name: Wallet Store

step.title: Reference Wallet's Resources Installation Request Request
step.description: The Wallet Manager send a Request to install the resources of the Reference Wallet
step.name: Wallet Manager

step.title: Download of resources in the device
step.description: The Wallet Resources Network Service download from the GitHub repository the necessary resources for the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet
step.name: Wallet Resources

step.title: Take of the Navigation Structure and Activation of the Reference Wallet
step.description: Take the Navigation Structure of the Reference Wallet and fire a event registering the activation of the Reference Wallet
step.name: Wallet Runtime

step.title: Marking the Reference Wallet has Installed
step.description: Mark the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet as Installed and fire a event
step.name: Wallet Manager

step.title: Request of resources for the Sub Apps
step.description: Request to the SubApp Resources Network Service the download of the resources for the Crypto Broker Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps
step.name: Sub App Manager

step.title: Download of resources for the Sub Apps
step.description: Download the resources for the Crypto Broker Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps
step.name: Sub App Resources

step.title: Take of the Navigation Structure and Activation of the Sub Apps
step.description: Take of the Navigation Structure of the Crypto Broker Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps and fire a event activate them
step.name: Sub App Runtime

step.title: Marking the Sub Apps has Installed
step.description: Mark the Sub Apps as Installed
step.name: Sub App Manager

process.name: Install a Crypto Customer Reference Wallet
process.description: Install a Crypto Broker Wallet from the Wallet Store

step.title: Customer select the Reference Wallet from the Wallet Store
step.description: The Customer enter in the Wallet Store en select the Crypto Customer Reference Wallet to install it.
step.name: Wallet Store

step.title: Invoke the installation of the Reference Wallet to the Wallet Manager
step.description: Invoke the installation of the Reference Wallet to the Wallet Manager Middleware Plugin
step.name: Wallet Store

step.title: Reference Wallet's Resources Installation Request Request
step.description: The Wallet Manager send a Request to install the resources of the Reference Wallet
step.name: Wallet Manager

step.title: Download of resources in the device
step.description: The Wallet Resources Network Service download from the GitHub repository the necessary resources for the Crypto Customer Reference Wallet
step.name: Wallet Resources

step.title: Take of the Navigation Structure and Activation of the Reference Wallet
step.description: Take the Navigation Structure of the Reference Wallet and fire a event registering the activation of the Reference Wallet
step.name: Wallet Runtime

step.title: Marking the Reference Wallet has Installed
step.description: Mark the Crypto Customer Reference Wallet as Installed and fire a event
step.name: Wallet Manager

step.title: Request of resources for the Sub Apps
step.description: Request to the SubApp Resources Network Service the download of the resources for the Crypto Customer Identity and Crypto Broker Community Sub Apps
step.name: Sub App Manager

step.title: Download of resources for the Sub Apps
step.description: Download the resources for the Crypto Customer Identity and Crypto Broker Community Sub Apps
step.name: Sub App Resources

step.title: Take of the Navigation Structure and Activation of the Sub Apps
step.description: Take of the Navigation Structure of the Crypto Customer Identity and Crypto Broker Community Sub Apps and fire a event activate them
step.name: Sub App Runtime

step.title: Marking the Sub Apps has Installed
step.description: Mark the Sub Apps as Installed
step.name: Sub App Manager

step.title: Start Crypto Broker Identity creation
step.description: Start Crypto Broker Identity creation.
step.name: Crypto Broker Identity

step.title: Process Crypto Broker Identity creation request
step.description: Process Crypto Broker Identity creation request.

step.description: Creates Crypto Broker Identity.

process.description: Show the list of Crypto Broker Identities

step.title: Request list of Identities
step.description: The Broker request the list of his Identities

step.title: Request the list of Identities
step.description: Request the list of Identities

step.title: Return the list of Identities

step.title: Show the list of Identities

process.name: List of Crypto Customer Identities

process.name: Associate a Broker Identity with a Reference Wallet
process.description: A Broker associate one of his Identities to a Crypto Broker Reference Wallet

step.title: Select a Crypto Broker Reference Wallet and request the list of Identities
step.description: The Broker select a Crypto Broker Reference Wallet from the Desktop of the Fermat app to associate and request the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Request the list of Identities
step.description: Receive the request from the Reference Wallet to obtain the list of Identities. This send the request to the Crypto Broker Identity Plugin
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Return the list of Identities
step.description: Return the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Return the list of Identities
step.description: Return the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Show the list of Identities and the broker selected the identity to associate
step.description: Show the list of Broker Identities. The broker select one identity and the reference wallet request the module to associate the selected identity
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Request the Wallet - Identity association to the Crypto Broker Actor Plugin
step.description: Receive the request from the Reference wallet and Request the Wallet - Identity association to the Crypto Broker Actor Plugin
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Register Wallet - Identity association
step.description: Register Wallet - Identity association in its Data Base
step.name: Crypto Broker

process.name: Associate a Customer Identity with a Reference Wallet
process.description: A Customer associate one of his Identities to a Crypto Customer Reference Wallet

step.title: Select a Crypto Customer Reference Wallet and request the list of Identities
step.description: The Customer select a Crypto Customer Reference Wallet from the Desktop of the Fermat app to associate and request the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Request the list of Identities
step.description: Receive the request from the Reference Wallet to obtain the list of Identities. This send the request to the Crypto Customer Identity Plugin
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Return the list of Identities
step.description: Return the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Return the list of Identities
step.description: Return the list of Identities
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Show the list of Identities and the Customer select the identity to associate
step.description: Show the list of Customer Identities. The Customer select one identity and the reference wallet request the module to associate the selected identity
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Request the Wallet - Identity association to the Crypto Customer Actor Plugin
step.description: Receive the request from the Reference wallet and Request the Wallet - Identity association to the Crypto Customer Actor Plugin
step.name: Crypto Customer

step.title: Register Wallet - Identity association
step.description: Register Wallet - Identity association in its Data Base
step.name: Crypto Customer

process.name: Crypto Broker Publish his Identity
process.description: Broker Publish his Identity to make it visible in the Fermat Network

step.title: Broker Select one Identity and select 'Publish'
step.description: The Broker Select one Identity and select 'Publish' in the UI. The Reference Wallet request the module to change the state of this identity to Public
step.name: Crypto Broker Identity

step.title: Request the actor to publish the identity
step.description: Request the actor to publish the identity
step.name: Crypto Broker Identity

step.title: Change the status of the Identity to Public
step.description: Change the status of the Identity to Public
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Modify in its Data Base the Status of the Identity
step.description: Modify in its Data Base the Status of the Identity
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Send the Identity Information to the Actor Network Service
step.description: Send the Identity Information to the Actor Network Service
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Consult the details of the identity to publish
step.description: Consult the details of the identity to publish and send it to the Fermat Network
step.name: Crypto Broker

process.name: Connection request from customer to broker
process.description: A customer sends a connection request to crypto broker in order to be able to see his products and start a negotiation.

step.title: Select broker and submit request
step.description: The customer selects a broker from the list and submits the request to connect to him.
step.name: Crypto Broker Community

step.title: Route request to network service
step.description: The module routes this request to the network service to reach the selected broker.
step.name: Crypto Broker Community

step.title: Call the broker to deliver the request
step.description: The network service places a call to the broker and then it delivers the request via the Fermat network.
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Transport request
step.description: The request is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.
step.name: Communication Layer

step.title: Receive the request
step.description: The network service receives the request and informs the Crypto Broker Actor.
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Records the request
step.description: The request is saved and a notification for the end user is created.
step.name: Crypto Broker

step.title: Records the notification
step.description: The the notification is saved and the OS core library is notified.
step.name: Notification

step.title: Send notification to the OS
step.description: Sends the notification to the OS and this in turn shows it to the end user.
step.name: Notification Manager

process.name: Payment Request to Intra user
process.description: A Wallet's Intra User sends a payment request to another intra user contact to request payment for a specific amount.

step.title: Select Intra User contact and submit payment request
step.description: The customer selects a contact from the list and submits the payment request.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

step.title: Route request to network service
step.description: The module routes this payment request to the Crypto Payment Request Plugin to reach the selected intra user.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: Route request to network service
step.description: The module routes this payment request to the network service to reach the selected intra user.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Call the intra user to deliver the payment request
step.description: The network service places a call to the intra user and then it delivers the payment request via the Fermat network.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Transport request
step.description: The payment request is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.
step.name: Communication Layer

step.title: Receive the payment request
step.description: The network service receives the payment request and informs that to Request Crypto Payment Plugin.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Records the request
step.description: The payment request is saved with the type received and associated to intra user actor .
step.name: Crypto Payment

step.title: Return payment request list
step.description: The module returns the payement request receive list.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: List Received Payment Request
step.description: The wallet's user go to Payment Request menu and list payment request receive.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

process.name: Refuse Payment Request from Intra user
process.description: A Wallet's Intra User refuse a payment request sent by another actor.

step.title: Select payment request record to refuse
step.description: The actor selects a payment request from the list and press deny button.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

step.title: Route request to payment request plugin
step.description: The module routes this payment request refuse to the Crypto Payment Request Plugin to reach the selected intra user.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: Route refuse to network service
step.description: The module routes this refuse to the network service to reach the selected intra user.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Call the intra user to deliver the refuse
step.description: The network service places a call to the intra user and then it delivers the refuse via the Fermat network.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Transport request
step.description: The payment request is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.
step.name: Communication Layer

step.title: Receive the payment request
step.description: The network service receives the refuse and informs that to Request Crypto Payment Plugin.
step.name: Crypto Payment Request

step.title: Update the request status
step.description: The payment request is update with the status deny.
step.name: Crypto Payment

step.title: Return payment request send list
step.description: The module returns the payement request send list.
step.name: Crypto Wallet

step.title: List Send Payment Request
step.description: The wallet's user go to Payment Request menu and list payment request send, and show this status.
step.name: Bitcoin Wallet

process.name: Creates an Intra Wallet User
process.description: Creates an Intra Wallet User Identity.

step.title: Start Intra User Identity creation
step.description: The user open the Wallet Users Register Identity and proceed to fill the requested data inside the form and press the save button.

step.title: Process Intra User Identity creation request
step.description: The module routes the data containing the name and profile picture to the IntraWalletUserModulePluginRoot plugin.
step.name: Intra Wallet User

step.title: Process Intra User Identity creation request
step.description: The plugin routes the name and profile picture to the IntraWalletIdentityPluginRoot plugin.
step.name: Intra Wallet User Module

step.title: Process Intra User Identity creation request
step.description: Within this plugin, two different keys are created, a public one and a private one, after that the plugin routes the data to the IntraWalletUserIdentityDao.
step.name: Intra Wallet Identity

step.title: Creates Intra User Identity
step.description: The dao inserts the data in the DB.
step.name: Intra Wallet User Identity.

process.name: Enter into the Community - Wallet Users

step.title: Start
step.description: The user opens the Community Wallet Users and the fragment proceeds to initialize all required components and data.
step.name: Intra User Community

step.title: Processing the requested list
step.description: The module routes the requested list.
step.name: Intra Wallet User

step.title: Routing the requested list.
step.description: The NS routes the request to the WS.
step.name: Intra Actor NS

step.title: Processing the list
step.description: The ws gets the connected list of components and send it back to the ns
step.name: WS Cloud Client Connection

step.title: Getting the list of connected users.
step.description: The NS routes the request back to the module.
step.name: Intra Actor NS

step.title: Sends the list back to the view
step.description: The module routes the requested list to the fragment.
step.name: Intra Wallet User

step.title: Start
step.description: The fragment displays the list of discovered users.
step.name: Intra User Community

process.name: Enter into the Community - Connections
process.previous: Enter into the Community - Wallet Users

step.title: Start
step.description: The user opens the Community Connections and the fragment proceeds to initialize all required components and data.
step.name: Intra User Community

step.title: Processing the requested list
step.description: The module routes the requested list to the IntraWalletUser plugin.
step.name: Intra Wallet User Module

step.title: Routing the requested list.
step.description: The plugin routes the request to the IntraWalletUserDao.
step.name: Intra Wallet User plugin

step.title: Processing the list
step.description: The list is retrived from the DB and send back to the plugin.
step.name: Intra Wallet User Dao

step.title: Getting the list of connected users.
step.description: The plugin send the request back to the module.
step.name: Intra Wallet User Plugin

step.title: Sends the list back to the view
step.description: The module routes the requested list to the fragment.
step.name: Intra Wallet User Module

step.title: Start
step.description: The fragment displays the list of connected users.
step.name: Intra User Community

process.name: Enter into the Community - Request Connections
process.description: List all users pending for acceptance.
process.previous: Enter into the Community - Wallet Users

step.title: Start
step.description: The user opens the Community Request Connections and the fragment proceeds to initialize all required components and data.
step.name: Intra User Community

step.title: Processing the requested list of users pending for acceptance.
step.description: The module routes the requested list to the IntraWalletUserActor plugin.
step.name: Intra Wallet User Module

step.title: Routing the requested list.
step.description: The plugin routes the request to the IntraWalletUserDao.
step.name: Intra Wallet User Actor plugin

step.title: Processing the list
step.description: The list is retrived from the DB and send back to the plugin.
step.name: Intra Wallet User Dao

step.title: Getting the list of connected users.
step.description: The plugin send the request back to the module.
step.name: Intra Wallet User Actor Plugin

step.title: Sends the list back to the view
step.description: The module routes the requested list to the fragment.
step.name: Intra Wallet User Module

step.title: Start
step.description: The fragment displays the list of users pending for acceptance.
step.name: Intra User Community
